title: No results if searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are returned.
OB: When searching for declarations using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: I expect that when searching via Package view selection and dialog, the relevant search results should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Package view
2. Select a package
3. Open the search dialog
4. Enter a search query
5. Verify that no results are shown
